title: Fix My Frankenhouse
overview: Boston-based home renovation experts and husband-wife team Mike and Denese Butler will fix "Frankenstein" houses filled with wonky layouts, misplaced staircases and maze-like hallways. Mike will employ his construction know-how to create a functional flow, while Denese will capture the clients' style with custom finishes. By blending elements of the older homes' charm with modern design, the couple will produce stunning and cohesive spaces.
